*div1 type="summary"* *p*Horatio Alsbury to Austin, Camargo, June 29, 1830. Introducing Don Gaspar Sais. Alarming rumors of the Government's intentions in Texas. */p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Comargo*/location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="06-29-1830"> 29th June 1830*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dr Sir,*/p*
*p*The *person_mentioned*bearer */person_mentioned*of this letter goes to *location_mentioned*New Orleans*/location_mentioned* with letters from a *person_mentioned*Lady */person_mentioned*of this place to her *person_mentioned*husband */person_mentioned*one of the *person_mentioned*Expulsed Spaniards */person_mentioned*in which is enclosed a passport or certificate from *location_mentioned*Mexico */location_mentioned*that he is excepted from the law of twenty Eight with the intention of bringing him to the *location_mentioned*Brazos */location_mentioned*if not to *location_mentioned*Comargo */location_mentioned*He is a *person_mentioned*gentleman */person_mentioned*highly Esteemed, here by Every person by request of his *person_mentioned*wife */person_mentioned*I address you this letter requesting you as a *person_mentioned*friend */person_mentioned*to the distressed and oppressed that should your influence be necessary for the forwarding on of the Express or the protection of *person_mentioned*Don Gaspar Sais (Dicha Spaniard)*/person_mentioned* should he come to *location_mentioned*Brazos*/location_mentioned*, to use your influence in his behalf also if you see proper to write him a note promising your protection by the *person_mentioned*Express */person_mentioned*and by so doing procure a wealthy and respectable *person_mentioned*citizen */person_mentioned*in your *location_mentioned*Colony */location_mentioned*as she wishes to move on and join him in *date_mentioned n="09-xx-1830">Septembre*/date_mentioned*—*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="06-28-1830">yesterday */date_mentioned*arrived here above a hundred *person_mentioned*convicts */person_mentioned*destined for *location_mentioned*Texas */location_mentioned*condemned to three years labor on the *location_mentioned*public buildings*/location_mentioned* that *person_mentioned*General Teran*/person_mentioned* is going to Establish there (for *person_mentioned*vagrants*/person_mentioned*) Report says here that you have notified the *person_mentioned*general */person_mentioned*that if he does not take immediate steps to establish a *person_mentioned*military force*/person_mentioned* in *location_mentioned*Tejas */location_mentioned*that there will be revolution in *location_mentioned*Nacogdoches */location_mentioned*Also that eighteen thousand *person_mentioned*Spaniards */person_mentioned*have disembarked in *location_mentioned*Tejas */location_mentioned*and destroyed the *person_mentioned*Military force*/person_mentioned* of that Department the latter however is not believed Several *person_mentioned*Companies of troops*/person_mentioned* have and are starting on to that point and an *person_mentioned*officer */person_mentioned**date_mentioned n="06-28-1830">yesterday */date_mentioned*told me that they were going to " Empinar " the *person_mentioned*Americans */person_mentioned*in *location_mentioned*Tejas */location_mentioned*" muy pronto " There is a great deal said of the *person_mentioned*Spanish Expedition*/person_mentioned* this fall Also that *person_mentioned*Bustamente */person_mentioned*is determined to stop the emigration of *person_mentioned*Americans */person_mentioned*to *location_mentioned*Tejas */location_mentioned*and even expulse those that are there however *person_mentioned*Teran */person_mentioned*speaks highly of you and your *location_mentioned*colony */location_mentioned*but does not yet know when he will start for *location_mentioned*Tejas */location_mentioned*you will oblige me by contesting [answering] this*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Horatio A. Alsberry*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*[Addressed]Al*person_mentioned* C. Esteban F. Austin*/person_mentioned* *location_mentioned*En San Felipe Rio Brazos*/location_mentioned*
*/p* */div1*
